main_definition: Changed or modified from its original state or form.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Changed in substance, composition, or properties.
meanings_and_examples.example: The wine was altered by adding too much water.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Modified to change appearance or style.
meanings_and_examples.example: She altered her clothes for the party - changing her jeans and top.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Changed in behavior, attitude, or character.
meanings_and_examples.example: After his injury, he seemed altered - distant and less outgoing than before.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Transformed as a result of disease, drugs, or other substances.
meanings_and_examples.example: The effects of the drug can alter your perception of reality.
